ssot__ProductCategoryProduct__dlm.name: Product Category Product
ssot__ProductCategoryProduct__dlm.description: The Product Category Product DMO represents assigning products to categories. For example, you can identify that a specific shoe belongs to the running category.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the catalog is available for use.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date that the catalog is unavailable.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to a system’s logical name that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to an object’s logical name where a record originated, for example, a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to a system that an external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to a business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to the product assigned to a category.

ssot__ProductCategoryID__c.description: A reference ID to the product category.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Product Category Product DMO.
